sentences.en: " Even in the graveyard here at hand, " answered the physician, continuing his employment.
sentences.cn: “ 在这跟前的坟地里就有, ” 医生一边继续干他的活,一边回答.

sentences.en: A drystone wall enclosed a graveyard where wildflowers grew.
sentences.cn: 清水石墙环抱着野花丛生的墓地.

sentences.en: A muffled sound of voices floated up from the far end of the graveyard.
sentences.cn: 这时从远远的坟地那边传来一阵低沉的说话声.

sentences.en: All the town was drifting toward the graveyard.
sentences.cn: 全镇的人都象流水似地向那坟场涌过去.

sentences.en: Detectives are still searching for those who violated the graveyard.
sentences.cn: 侦探们仍在搜捕那些亵渎了墓园的家伙。

sentences.en: Do you know the origin of the term graveyard shift?
sentences.cn: 你知道墓地值班这个词的由来 吗 ?

sentences.en: He suggested we have to go to eat despite graveyard shift.
sentences.cn: 他提议说咱们没出国疑问在大夜班结束以后一起去吃物品.

sentences.en: He suggested we have to go to eat despite my graveyard shift.
sentences.cn: 他提议说咱们没去外国疑问在我的大夜班之后一起去吃物品.

sentences.en: Instead I drive across the river to a family graveyard.
sentences.cn: 我却驾车去了河对岸的一块家族墓地.

sentences.en: It was standing in the graveyard, in the grass, its bottom missing.
sentences.cn: 站在墓地的青草上面去了, 而且瓶底已经丢失,虽然丢失了也就让它空空地站在墓边.

sentences.en: Living next to a graveyard would give me the creeps.
sentences.cn: 居住在墓地旁边会使我毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: Stands erect on the graveyard of church 3 hundred years the old oak, rustlingly ground suddenly.
sentences.cn: 屹立在教堂墓地上已经三百年的老橡树, 突然间哗啦啦地倒在地上.

sentences.en: The area had become a graveyard for old cars.
sentences.cn: 这块地方已成了堆放废弃汽车的场地.

sentences.en: They made their way to a graveyard to pay their traditional respects to the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们按惯例前往墓地悼念死者。

sentences.en: This had once been the greatest port in the world, now it was a graveyard of rusting cranes.
sentences.cn: 这里一度是全球最大的港口，现在堆满了锈迹斑斑的吊车。

trans.tran_en: an area of ground where people are buried, often next to a church
